documents.document: @Fantaskatic Try some good one and you won`t notice the difference. It`s delicious.🍨

@MattMitovich @TheCWSupergirl Her Lois Lane has been my favourite ever. She and Dean Cain were superb together 😀

@onlythebattles Brilliant! Short, sweet (boy, is it sweet!) and on point! I loved the way Kate dismissed Agent Fallon. 😀💗
@monixdecastro I haven`t stopped laughing at this for an hour now... Genius! 😂
@justinhartley I joined the 40s club last year, it`s great fun over here, you`re going to love it 😀
@sashaalexander Isn`t she terrified?
Castle / Suits... https://t.co/eErggnTYNv

@InsaneCastleBot @g_caskett Beckett to Montgomery.
@Castle_in_CA That and "God, I love him so much!" 😃💞
@Stana_Katic Lord, have mercy on my poor little fan heart... 😍
@Castle_in_CA I always expect him to start coughing here!
@Castle_in_CA Any idea what Beckett`s thinking here? https://t.co/M0u5yZfjab
@InsaneCastleBot @dia_47 Castle to Beckett.
@Castle_in_CA Should we be concerned for your patients?🤣
@chanhoed I`ve seen them around her in some unaltered photos, and it makes me think that even the invisible world is enamoured with her. 🙂
@chanhoed The orbs 😀 Some say they`re spirits/angels around the person photographed.
@InsaneCastleBot Beckett to Castle, s2
@InsaneCastleBot @jstar1382 Beckett to Castle. I love how I recognize who said what by one line 😀
@KaticxStanatic The length of her legs! https://t.co/MYvKo74hqk
@chanhoed Aw, you added the angels again, lovely 💗
@Castle_in_CA I stopped breathing for a minute when I watched it for the first time.
@Castle_in_CA I`m Polish, and I agree, it`s terrifying.
Excited for this! https://t.co/z3I66rCaZ3
@angelcosta78 squealed rather than squeaked, but whatever, I`m ignoring the fact that there`s no EDIT button on this thing!!
@angelcosta78 ...of the girl and looked for excuses to touch/pat her hand was the sweetest thing to watch; I smiled and squeaked inside. 💞
@angelcosta78 BOO! I had quite a different experience on the bus today. A teenage couple: the way the boy kept sneaking little glimpses...
@reallybeanie Maybe he`s practising for "Bookaboo" ? 😄
It was Christmas Day exactly a month ago, just saying...
@angelcosta78 KB reading some twitter posts. 😄
@ChrissyMetz and @justinhartley I can`t find the right words to describe how much I loved you both in last night`s episode... 😘😘
@NBCThisisUs just blew me away again...
@KaticxStanatic Oh dear, you`re so young and that`s a lot of medication! Is it temporary or long term?
@mynewhandbag The previous post had a typo. 🙃
An inspiration. #WCW #StanaKatic https://t.co/SnACkRkX9K
@TinkonBrink And carry on!
@TinkonBrink Don`t we all know it? 😆
@soleil_lu @TinkonBrink This is precious, GiGi! 👍
@TinkonBrink I used to read this book to my little pupils in the school. The title seems appropriate 😄 https://t.co/1upcinDHaN
@TinkonBrink Poor Mum!! And you? Sticking your bottom at the world like that? Tsk tsk 😂
@TinkonBrink Gimme a moment here... https://t.co/iitf74dDBp
@TinkonBrink Having said that though, my charisma is that of a hibernating bear, ha ha!
@TinkonBrink We had things to do, places to be, people to see! Full term is for the lazy 🤣
@TinkonBrink That`s what I always say. And I think I wanted to be a Capricorn, so held off for as long as possible, until the 19th 😄
@TinkonBrink I`d chosen my b-day well then, ha ha! Although I was supposed to have been born on March 8th, so before Easter...
@Castle_in_CA @g_caskett Meg, are you raising a little RC or KB?
@Fantaskatic Remember to add Emily!
@TinkonBrink 👍Cool! My Mum loves Toblerone. I got a Cadbury Dairy Milk bar for my b-day from a friend. 360g. It`s gigantic!
@TinkonBrink Oh yeah, bigger gaps, that`s what it is! Still yummy though, I assume?
@angelcosta78 It really does. She`s exceptionally photogenic. I`d need to have a hundred photos taken to choose a decent one. 😄
@TinkonBrink Is it the regular size, or the new, cut down one?
@shannon_hausen Is this from the Eric Vaughn episode?
@angelcosta78 Each day I notice something else, either the hair, or the eyes, or the general softness. This time it`s the lips. Beautiful.
I`m after my first Mindfulness class. Stress can suck it! 🤣
@reallybeanie You are strong, powerful, and beautiful. What you shared yesterday took a lot of guts, and I thank you for that. 😀😘
@Stana_Katic Stop this right now, I am begging you! I`m a straight woman, and I can`t breathe looking at you! 😍😘😀
@angelcosta78 So much beautiful softness 😀
@Jolie_Chae @KBclothes_ebay I LOVED it on KB, and it looks amazing on you!
@joshuahorowitz @iamBenLyons Aw, Kristen and Joshie back together!! 😀
@queennn94 Aw, she`s in her element, awesome!😀
@kovesi1 And who`s Sophia Lauren?
@newtgingrich Who`s Sophia Lauren?
@Stana_Katic As someone once said, "yin needs yang" 😀
@sunshinekatic_ Block! Unfollowing doesn`t seem to work, it keeps coming back.
@quietchaos_ Block them or it`ll keep happening. I "followed" Potus, Flotus and VP on and off yesterday until I blocked them.
@Castle_in_CA @Twitter Blocking seems the only way.
@CastleAddict @nic6879 @lily_bart Same here, including the VP account. I had to block them to be removed from those lists.
@katicsbiitch The same with VP. I had to block them to remove myself from the lists.
